title: How You Pootin
itunes:title: How You Pootin
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Gervonta Davis gifting his baby mom gifts for her birthday while in a relationship. Also we opened up the phone lines a second time after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a dad who attacked his son's opponent during a wrestling match, and we wanted to see if our listeners would do the same.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Gervonta Davis gifting his baby mom gifts for her birthday while in a relationship. Also we opened up the phone lines a second time after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a dad who attacked his son's opponent during a wrestling match, and we wanted to see if our listeners would do the same.
